item.title: [Python] Build environment with pyenv and pyenv-virtualenv
item.description: ## A note on how to build your own environment I will write it down because I need it when working remotely The referenced website may be easier to understand The environment is mac OSX: Yosemite. #pyenv pyenv manages the python environment. You can create a python environment that is different from the standard environment. Reference URL: How to use pyenv and virtualenv How to manage Python environment with pyenv Try using pyenv and virtualenv
